nodes.text: The Chancellor's "working office" was located directly below the Senate Chamber in the Senate Building. A part of the Chancellery Secretariat, in its center housed the Chancellor's podium, which was able to rise 30 meters high to the chamber above. Emperor Palpatine was officed here along with Mas Amedda when Jedi Master Yoda entered the chamber, who immediately knocked out two Royal Guards by the entrance.
